+    DayInWeek(

+      "Sat",
+    ),
+  ];

   Widget build(BuildContext context) {
     return Scaffold(
       body: Column(children: [
 
         TextButton(onPressed: (){
 
+showDialog(
+                  context: context,
+                  builder: (BuildContext context) {
+                    return Expanded(
+                      child: AlertDialog(
+                        title: Text('Welcome'),
+                        content: Text('GeeksforGeeks'),
+                        actions: [
+                         Column(children: [
 
 
+                         ],)
+                        ],
+                      ),
+  
+                    );
+                  },
+                );
+
+
         }, child: Text("click me "))
       ],),
     );
   }
